DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect especial diet therapy `` Anti-inflammatory Diet '' inflammatory , oxidative stress , nutritional marker context protein-energy wasting syndrome ( PEW ) hemodialysis patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Anti-inflammatory Diet Inflammatory , Oxidative Nutritional Markers Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients hemodialysis ( HD ) least two time week 3months without internment illness admission Hospitalization sepsis surgery 3 month prior intervention Cirrhosis Hepatitis virus infection Human Immunodeficiency virus infection Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome Active malignancy Active infection Absence communication Mental Impairment Terminal illness Tube feeding Total parenteral nutrition Pregnancy Not previously see dietitian within 3 month prior enrollment study Not expect transplant within 6 month enrollment study Absence malnutrition cause end stage renal disease ( ESRD ) Psychiatric condition , prevent adherence intervention Consuming immunosuppressive drug take antioxidant supplement include Vitamin E , Vitamin C , Nacetyl cysteine ( NAC ) , Pentoxifylline , Lipoic acid , Fishoil extract ( omega3 fatty acid ) , Soy extract ( isoflavones ) , Greentea preparation , Pomegranate extract , Grape extract within 2 month prior enrollment study
